Name: Sudden Raid
Desc: Calls in a horde of friends to attack enemies. Sudden Raid does not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status.

Desc.Old: Calls in a horde of friends to attack enemies. Sudden Raid is not affected by enemies in the Damage Reflection status. Decreases Final Cut cooldown by a certain percentage.
Desc.New: Calls in a horde of friends to attack enemies. Sudden Raid does not cause you to take damage even when attacking enemies in the Damage Reflection Status.

H.Old:
MP Cost: 290. Attacks up to 15 enemies at 494% damage 7 times. 1% DoT every 1 sec. for 10 sec.
When used, Final Cut's remaining Cooldown -20%
Cooldown: 30 sec.
H.New:
MP Cost: 290. Attacks up to 15 enemies at 494% Damage 7 times. 1% DoT every 1 sec. for 10 sec.
Cooldown: 30 sec.
